Constructor Detail

TreeApplet

public TreeApplet()
Method Detail

init

public void init()
Intializes an applet and set pan and zoom event handlers. It also adds a tool bar to provide features like - changing link layout and orientation of tree.
Overrides:
init in class java.applet.Applet

buildToolBar

public java.awt.Panel buildToolBar()
Builds a tool bar. It provides features like - changing a link representation in a tree (angled or straight)and changing an orientation of tree (horizontal or vertical)

setLinkStyle

public void setLinkStyle(int wanted)

setOrientation

public void setOrientation(int wanted)

addNode

public void addNode(java.lang.String node1,
                    java.lang.String parent,
                    java.lang.String link)
             throws NodeNotFoundException,
                    NodeNameNotUniqueException
Accepts a request to add a node to scenegraph. Node name must be unique or it will throw a NodeNameNotUnique exception. The node which should be set as a parent node must already be added to a tree or it will throw a NodeNotPresent exception.
Specified by:
addNode in interface ITreeApplet

removeNode

public void removeNode(java.lang.String node1)
                throws NodeNotFoundException
Accepts a node name, selects it and calls removeAChild(). It throws NodeNotFound exception if requested node is not present in a tree.
Specified by:
removeNode in interface ITreeApplet

initScreen

public void initScreen()
Opens nodefile.txt file and reads nodename, parent name and associated link from it. If parent node is not present and tree is not intialized yet, it will add that node as a root node.

addAChild

public void addAChild(ZNode parent,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String link)
This is method is called by addNode method. It will add a root node and intializes a tree if no node was selected else it will add a new node as a child of a selected node. It will set a node name and a link given by addNode.

removeAChild

public void removeAChild()
This method is called by removeNode method. It takes a node selected by removeNode and removes it from a tree.

scalePlus

public void scalePlus(java.lang.String name)
Called by scale(String). It will scale a specified node by a factor of 2.

scaleMinus

public void scaleMinus(java.lang.String name)
Called by scale(String). It will scale a specified node by a factor of 0.5.

scale

public void scale(java.lang.String name)
           throws NodeNotFoundException
Called by valueChanged(String) method in ComponentApplet. If given node (and its group) is already scaled by a factor of 2, this method will restore it to its original size else it will scale it by a factor of 2.
Specified by:
scale in interface ITreeApplet

focusNode

public void focusNode(java.lang.String name,
                      java.awt.Color highlightColor)
               throws NodeNotFoundException
This method will highlight a given node.
Specified by:
focusNode in interface ITreeApplet

                              throws NodeNotFoundException

                    throws NodeNotFoundException
